attributes.action: Make it illegal for companies to discriminate based on vaccination status
attributes.additional_details:
Given that vaccination is a personal choice no one should be discriminated against for choosing not to have a vaccination. 
Creating a two tiered work force by limiting workers access to company benefits is unethical and would not be allowed for other reasons such as age, gender, race and religion.
attributes.background: Given that more and more companies are deciding to refuse staff access to company sick pay if they are unvaccinated against covid-19, bring in law making it illegal for companies to discriminate in this manner, a persons vaccination status should have no effect on their access to work place benefits

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599841
